title: pumping_water_into_200_liter_tank
summary: Electric power connected and water pumped into a 200-liter tank.
description: This data unit documents the moment when electrical power was connected and water was successfully pumped into a 200-liter storage tank at MaMeeFarm. This action directly follows the lowering of the submersible pump recorded in data unit 00043.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
